meta.project: Flipzokart Order Tracking and Invoice System

product_overview: Flipzokart Order Tracking and Invoice System enables users to track their orders in real-time and view or download their order invoices seamlessly via a web interface.
core_goals: Provide real-time order tracking details including order status, items, and shipping information.
Allow users to access and download detailed order invoices.
Ensure intuitive user experience with fast response times leveraging modern frontend technologies.
Maintain secure and reliable API endpoints for data fetching.
key_features: Real-time order tracking page displaying current status, product items, shipping and payment details.
Invoice viewing and downloading functionality on a dedicated invoice page.
RESTful API endpoints serving order tracking and invoice data using secure path parameter methods.
Built with TypeScript and React for robust frontend experience, styled with Tailwind CSS, and enhanced with Socket.IO for real-time updates.
user_flow_summary: User navigates to the Track Order page and inputs their tracking ID.
System fetches current order tracking details via /api/tracking/{trackingId} endpoint and displays status, items, and shipping info in real-time.
User can navigate to the Invoice page by order ID to view detailed billing information.
Invoice data is fetched securely from /api/tracking/{orderId} endpoint and presented with options to download or print.
validation_criteria: Order tracking details load accurately and update in real-time as order status changes.
Invoice page displays correct billing data matching order information.
APIs respond within acceptable performance parameters with appropriate error handling.
Frontend interface is responsive and meets UI/UX standards across supported devices.
